GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.18.8
GSD.description:
memory: samsung: exynos5422-dmc: Fix refcount leak in of_get_dram_timings

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.8 by commit bb2a481778c60f912c363e271ae46b55ff8132db, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit 6e7674c3c6df565ab47d02b4f2e608e3477cdf86. For more details please see the references link.
